installCommand: pnpm install && cd ../../packages/database && PRISMA_CLI_BINARY_TARGETS="rhel-openssl-3.0.x,linux-musl-openssl-3.0.x" pnpm prisma generate --schema=./prisma/schema.prisma --no-hints && cd ../../apps/web && mkdir -p .prisma/client && cp -r ../../packages/database/generated/client/* .prisma/client/ 2>/dev/null || true
